author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

This adds the missing header `cmath` for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h which uses `sqrt` without including `cmath` header. This causes header consistency error [a]

[a] https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-43b94f/48658/headers_chks.log

```
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h: In member function 'virtual std::pair<float, float> LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator::dedx(const reco::DeDxHitCollection&)':
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h:19:46: error: 'sqrt' is not a member of 'std'; did you mean 'sort'?
   19 |     if (n >= 3 && (chi2 > 1.3 * n + 4 * std::sqrt(1.3 * n))) {
      |                                              ^~~~
      |                                              sort
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h:27:28: error: 'sqrt' is not a member of 'std'; did you mean 'sort'?
   27 |     return {value[0], std::sqrt(value[1])};
      |                            ^~~~
      |                            sort
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h:27:42: error: could not convert '{value.std::array<double, 2>::operator[](0), <expression error>}' from '<brace-enclosed initializer list>' to 'std::pair<float, float>'
   27 |     return {value[0], std::sqrt(value[1])};
      |                                          ^
      |                                          |
      |                                          <brace-enclosed initializer list>
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h: In member function 'void LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator::calculate_wrt_epsilon(const reco::DeDxHit&, const double&, std::array<double, 3>&)':
src/RecoTracker/DeDx/interface/LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h:47:23: error: 'sqrt' is not a member of 'std'; did you mean 'sort'?
   47 |   const auto s = std::sqrt(ss);
      |                       ^~~~
      |                       sort
```

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: Update LikelihoodFitDeDxEstimator.h: added cmath header to fix the header consistency error
